Articles.Content:
I'll keep this short as there's not much to say in regards to this request. So! 0.24 is out and it's pretty fun -thanks Squad- however there is one minor gripe, the UI interface doesn't scale with the new font/side bar text/ect. I'm thinking this slipped through but it'd be nice if they could change this as it's difficult for me to see because of my bad eyesight.

Thank you for reading.
